name: solar-power
caption: Solar Power

effect.short: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.
effect.full: During [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}, this Pokémon has 1.5× its [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} but takes 1/8 of its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage after each turn.

flavorText:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP
decreases every turn.
